page.title: 09VILLAGE PASTIMES IN WILDEN.
page.content:
{CRICKET }has been played in Wilden for 100 years. The club has 2 teams in the Premier Division-Bedford League. Boasts the best village ground with an all-weather practice wicket. {FOOTBALL }Club = members of the Beds. Sunday League -2nd. Division. {DARTS}teams - at the Victoria Arms.
There's a well-used baby-sitting circle.
Discos, pantomimes, concerts,O.A.P. parties, Whist Drives, suppers, dances,etc., all held in the Village Hall or School. Brownies and Cubs meet in Colmworth. No Youth Club for the youngsters. No play areas.
{3 PUBLIC HOUSES.}Victoria Arms, Nag's Head, and the Wheatsheaf.
